mapper.insert: insert into user_info(user_code, user_name, user_pwd, user_type, user_state, is_delete, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{userCode},#{userName},#{userPwd},#{userType},#{userState}, #{isDelete},#{createBy},#{createTime},#{updateBy},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update user_info set is_delete = #{isDelete}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} where user_id = #{userId}
